trans-unit.source: Represents the enumerator for <xref href="System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust"></xref> objects in the <xref href="System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: 代表列舉值<xref href="System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust"></xref>中的物件<xref href="System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustCollection"></xref>集合。

trans-unit.source: Enumerators only allow reading the data in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 列舉值只允許讀取集合中的資料。

trans-unit.source: Enumerators cannot be used to modify the underlying collection.
trans-unit.target: 列舉值無法用於修改基礎集合。

trans-unit.source: Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 一開始，列舉程式位在集合中的第一個項目之前。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustEnumerator.Reset%2A> method also brings the enumerator back to this position.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustEnumerator.Reset%2A>方法也會列舉值帶回至這個位置。</xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustEnumerator.Reset%2A>

trans-unit.source: At this position, calling the <xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustEnumerator.Current%2A> property throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 在這個位置上，呼叫<xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustEnumerator.Current%2A>屬性會擲回的例外狀況。</xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustEnumerator.Current%2A>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you must call the <xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> method to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of the <xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustEnumerator.Current%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 因此，您必須呼叫<xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>方法，以將列舉值前進到第一個項目，再讀取的值集合的<xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustEnumerator.Current%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustEnumerator.Current%2A> </xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustEnumerator.Current%2A> returns the same object until either <xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> or <xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustEnumerator.Reset%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustEnumerator.Current%2A>會傳回相同的物件直到<xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>或<xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustEnumerator.Reset%2A>稱為。</xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustEnumerator.Reset%2A> </xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustEnumerator.MoveNext%2A></xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustEnumerator.Current%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> sets <xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustEnumerator.Current%2A> to the next element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>設定<xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustEnumerator.Current%2A>下一個項目。</xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustEnumerator.Current%2A></xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: After the end of the collection is passed, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection, and calling <xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 集合的末端後，列舉程式會放置在集合中，最後一個元素之後和呼叫<xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>傳回`false`。</xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the last call to <xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> returned `false`, calling <xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustEnumerator.Current%2A> throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果最後一個呼叫<xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>傳回`false`，則呼叫<xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustEnumerator.Current%2A>擲回例外狀況。</xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustEnumerator.Current%2A> </xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: To reset <xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustEnumerator.Current%2A> to the first element of the collection, call <xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustEnumerator.Reset%2A> followed by a call to <xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要重設<xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustEnumerator.Current%2A>第一個元素的集合中，呼叫<xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustEnumerator.Reset%2A>後面接著<xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>.</xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>呼叫</xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustEnumerator.Reset%2A></xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustEnumerator.Current%2A>

trans-unit.source: An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 只要集合維持不變，列舉程式就持續有效。

trans-unit.source: If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and the next call to <xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> or <xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustEnumerator.Reset%2A> throws an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果變更集合，例如加入、 修改或刪除項目，列舉程式會永久失效，而且下次呼叫<xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>或<xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustEnumerator.Reset%2A>會擲回<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>例外狀況。</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustEnumerator.Reset%2A> </xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the collection is modified between calling <xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> and <xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustEnumerator.Current%2A>, <xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustEnumerator.Current%2A> returns the element to which it is currently set, even if the enumerator is already invalidated.
trans-unit.target: 如果呼叫之間修改集合<xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>和<xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustEnumerator.Current%2A>，<xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustEnumerator.Current%2A>傳回項目，它目前設定的即使列舉值已經無效。</xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustEnumerator.Current%2A> </xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustEnumerator.Current%2A> </xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure.
trans-unit.target: 列舉程式沒有集合的獨佔存取因此，列舉集合在本質上並非安全執行緒程序。

trans-unit.source: Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 即使集合經過同步化，其他的執行緒仍可修改該集合，使列舉值擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.
trans-unit.target: 若要保證列舉過程的執行緒安全，您可以在整個列舉過程中鎖定集合，或攔截由其他執行緒的變更所造成的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Gets the current <xref href="System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust"></xref> object in the <xref href="System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前<xref href="System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust"></xref>物件存放至<xref href="System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustCollection"></xref>集合。

trans-unit.source: When the enumerator is created, it does not point to an object, so the Current property is not valid and will throw an exception if it is accessed.
trans-unit.target: 建立列舉值時，它並未指向一個物件，因此目前的屬性不正確，如果它存取將會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: You must first call the <xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> method to position the cursor at the first object in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 您必須先呼叫<xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>方法，以將游標放在集合中的第一個物件。</xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: Multiple calls to Current with no intervening calls to <xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> will return the same <xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust> object.
trans-unit.target: 目前沒有中介呼叫具有多個呼叫<xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>傳回相同<xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust>物件。</xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust> </xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: The current <xref href="System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust"></xref> in the <xref href="System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The current <xref href="System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust"></xref> in the <xref href="System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustCollection"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Moves to the next element in the <xref href="System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: 移至下一個項目，在<xref href="System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustCollection"></xref>集合。

trans-unit.source: The MoveNext method immediately returns `false` if there are no objects in the collection.
trans-unit.target: MoveNext 方法會立即傳回`false`如果集合中沒有任何物件。

trans-unit.source: MoveNext will return `true` until it has reached the end of the collection.
trans-unit.target: 會傳回 MoveNext`true`直到它到達集合結尾。

trans-unit.source: It will then return `false` for each successive call.
trans-unit.target: 然後它會傳回`false`針對每個後續的呼叫。

trans-unit.source: However, after MoveNext has returned `false`, accessing the <xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustEnumerator.Current%2A> property will throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 不過，傳回 MoveNext 之後`false`、 存取<xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustEnumerator.Current%2A>屬性將會擲回例外狀況。</xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustEnumerator.Current%2A>

trans-unit.source: Upon creation, an enumerator is positioned before the first <xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust> object in the collection, and the first call to MoveNext positions the enumerator at the first object in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 在建立列舉程式位在第一個<xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust>中集合和第一個呼叫 MoveNext 物件列舉值置於在集合中的第一個物件。</xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the enumerator was successfully advanced to the next element; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the enumerator has passed the end of the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果列舉值成功前移至下一個元素;，<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>如果列舉值已跳過集合結尾。

trans-unit.source: Resets the enumerator to the beginning of the <xref href="System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: 將列舉值重設為開頭<xref href="System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustCollection"></xref>集合。

trans-unit.source: An enumerator moves in a forward-only direction.
trans-unit.target: 列舉值會順向的方向移動。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to return the enumerator to the beginning of the collection of <xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust> objects.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個方法傳回列舉值之集合的開頭<xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust>物件。</xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust>

trans-unit.source: The Reset method positions the cursor at the first object in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 重設方法會將游標放在集合中的第一個物件。

trans-unit.source: After calling Reset, you do not need to call the <xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> method to move the cursor forward to the first object.
trans-unit.target: 在呼叫之後重設，您不需要呼叫<xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>方法，將游標向前移到第一個物件。</xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets the current <xref:System.Object> in the <xref href="System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前<xref:System.Object>中<xref href="System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustCollection"></xref>集合。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Do not call this method; use the <xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustEnumerator.Current%2A> property instead.
trans-unit.target: 請勿呼叫這個方法。使用<xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustEnumerator.Current%2A>屬性改為。</xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustEnumerator.Current%2A>

trans-unit.source: The current <xref:System.Object> in the <xref href="System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 目前<xref:System.Object>中<xref href="System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrustCollection"> </xref>。</xref:System.Object>
